duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement hospital policies, including DEA/Controlled Substances and OSHA compliance.
Manage and plan the overall operations of the hospital, including creating the hospital schedule and managing labor costs to budget.
Address staffing needs including hiring, training, reviewing, and disciplining of staff.
Drive client visits through strategic client communication and local marketing efforts.
Manage accounts receivable and cash on hand, including performing invoice audit reviews.
Cultivate a supportive and collaborative team environment, including coaching, developing, and motivating staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business or related degree is preferred (Master's preferred)
3-5 years of experience in a manager role, including customer service experience. Experience in a hospital setting in positions of increased responsibility is a plus.
